meanings.sent1: The town celebrated its quatercentenary with a big parade.
meanings.sent2: The quatercentenary of the school was marked with special events.
meanings.sent3: At the quatercentenary party, everyone dressed up in historical costumes.
meanings.sent4: The quatercentenary of the famous battle was a time for reflection on history.
meanings.sent5: The quatercentenary brought the community together in a spirit of unity.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a 400th anniversary.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed quatercentenary artifacts from the founding year.
meanings.sent2: The quatercentenary celebration included a historical exhibition.
meanings.sent3: She baked a quatercentenary cake with a four hundred candle.
meanings.sent4: The quatercentenary decorations added a touch of history to the event.
meanings.sent5: The quatercentenary theme ran through all the activities of the day.
